### Tender Details

#### Title
* **Food Catering Services for 31 Canadian Brigade Group at Exercise Arrowhead Guardian** 
* **Services de traiteur pour le 31e Groupe-brigade du Canada dans le cadre de l’exercice Arrowhead Guardian**

#### Reference Number
WS4576354614-Doc4576381846


### Contract Information

#### Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (DPWGS)

#### Procurement Category
Services

#### Notice Type
Request for Proposal

#### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Selection Criteria
Variations or combinations of the above methods

### Tender Opportunity
**Description**
The Department of National Defence (DND), 31 Canadian Brigade Group (31 CBG) requires catering services for Exercise Arrowhead Guardian, scheduled to take place from 16 August 2024 to 25 August 2024 in Camp Grayling, Michigan.

**Location**
Camp Grayling, Michigan, USA

**Duration**
16 August 2024 to 25 August 2024

### Key Dates
**Publication Date**
13 June 2024

**Tender Closing Date**
9 July 2024, 14:00 EDT

### Trade Agreements and Opportunities
**Trade Agreements**
The following trade agreements are applicable to this tender:
• Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
• Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
• World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
• Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
• Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
